Hackers often describe what they do as playfully creative problem solving.
I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.
I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
Never fire a laser at a mirror.
Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand.
Everything was beautiful and nothing hurt.
He who controls the spice controls the universe.
Never own more than you can carry in both hands at a dead run.
The gods do not protect fools. Fools are protected by more capable fools.
Would it save you a lot of time if I just gave up and went mad now?
I'm not insane sir. I have a finely calibrated sense of acceptable risk.
If you think this Universe is bad, you should see some of the others.
Insanity is relative. It depends on who has who locked in what cage.
Remember, hacking is more than just a crime. It's a survival trait.
Foolproof systems don't take into account the ingenuity of fools.
Human Stupidity, that's why Hackers always win.
